statements: SELECT * FROM training_weather WHERE temperature > 25.0;
SELECT date, temperature FROM training_weather WHERE humidity < 50.0 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT training_session_id, performance_rating FROM training_weather WHERE wind_speed < 10.0 ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_weather WHERE performance_rating > 8 AND wind_speed > 15.0;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM training_weather GROUP BY date ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM training_weather WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31';
SELECT * FROM training_weather WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60;
SELECT training_session_id, date, performance_rating FROM training_weather WHERE wind_speed > 10 ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM training_weather GROUP BY date;
SELECT training_session_id, date, temperature, humidity, performance_rating FROM training_weather WHERE performance_rating >= 4 AND temperature < 20 ORDER BY date ASC, performance_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_sessions;
SELECT session_id, date, duration_minutes FROM training_sessions WHERE duration_minutes > 60;
SELECT * FROM training_sessions ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT session_id, date, performance_score FROM training_sessions WHERE performance_score >= 8.0;
SELECT plan_id, goal, recommended_sessions_per_week FROM training_plans WHERE duration_weeks >= 8;
SELECT * FROM training_sessions WHERE performance_score > 8.5 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT session_id, date, duration_minutes FROM training_sessions WHERE weather_condition = 'Sunny' ORDER BY duration_minutes DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS session_count, AVG(duration_minutes) AS avg_duration FROM training_sessions GROUP BY weather_condition;
SELECT session_id, date, ROUND(performance_score, 2) AS rounded_score FROM training_sessions WHERE performance_score < 7.0;
SELECT goal, duration_weeks, recommended_sessions_per_week FROM training_plans WHERE impact_on_performance LIKE '%High%' ORDER BY duration_weeks ASC;
SELECT * FROM training_sessions;
SELECT session_id, date, temperature, humidity FROM training_sessions WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT session_id, date, weather_conditions FROM training_sessions WHERE humidity < 60;
SELECT session_id, DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM training_sessions ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT plan_id, target_distance, target_duration FROM training_plans WHERE target_duration > '01:30:00';
SELECT * FROM training_sessions ORDER BY date DESC, temperature ASC;
SELECT session_id, humidity, weather_conditions FROM training_sessions WHERE humidity > 50;
SELECT * FROM training_sessions WHERE DATE(date) = '2022-07-15' OR weather_conditions LIKE '%sunny%';
SELECT session_id, MAX(temperature) AS max_temp FROM training_sessions GROUP BY session_id ORDER BY max_temp DESC;
SELECT session_id, athlete_id, average_speed FROM performance_metrics WHERE average_speed > 10 AND heart_rate < 150;
SELECT * FROM training_sessions;
SELECT session_id, date, temperature FROM training_sessions ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT plan_name, plan_description FROM training_plans WHERE plan_id = 3;
SELECT performance_score, performance_notes FROM performance_analysis WHERE performance_score > 8;
SELECT session_id, weather_condition, temperature FROM training_sessions WHERE weather_condition = 'Sunny';
SELECT * FROM training_sessions ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT session_id, date, temperature FROM training_sessions WHERE temperature > 20 ORDER BY temperature ASC;

SELECT training_sessions.session_id, performance_score, performance_notes FROM performance_analysis JOIN training_sessions ON performance_analysis.session_id = training_sessions.session_id WHERE performance_score > 8 ORDER BY performance_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT plan_name, plan_description, impact_factor FROM training_plans JOIN plan_impact ON training_plans.plan_id = plan_impact.plan_id WHERE impact_factor > 0.5 ORDER BY impact_factor DESC;

SELECT session_id, weather_condition, temperature, performance_score, impact_notes FROM training_sessions JOIN performance_analysis ON training_sessions.session_id = performance_analysis.session_id JOIN plan_impact ON training_sessions.session_id = plan_impact.session_id ORDER BY temperature DESC, performance_score DESC, impact_notes ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM TrainingSessions;
SELECT athlete_id, name, age FROM Athletes WHERE team = 'Soccer';
SELECT description, planned_distance FROM TrainingPlans WHERE intensity > 5;
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherForecast ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT session_id, location, temperature, humidity FROM TrainingSessions WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT * FROM TrainingSessions ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT session_id, location, temperature, humidity FROM TrainingSessions WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60;
SELECT Athletes.name, Athletes.age, PerformanceMetrics.avg_speed FROM Athletes JOIN PerformanceMetrics ON Athletes.athlete_id = PerformanceMetrics.athlete_id WHERE PerformanceMetrics.avg_speed > 10;
SELECT DISTINCT team FROM Athletes WHERE age > 25;

SELECT TrainingPlans.athlete_id, Athletes.name, TrainingPlans.date, TrainingPlans.planned_distance FROM TrainingPlans JOIN Athletes ON TrainingPlans.athlete_id = Athletes.athlete_id ORDER BY date ASC, planned_distance DESC LIMIT 5;
